API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.materials.attributes.MaterialAttributes

type
class
version
3.1
The MaterialAttributes class is used to apply one or more attributes to a Shape3D object.

Constructor

new()
Creates a new LightAttributes object.

Instance Variables

attributes : Array<IAttributes>

List of attributes.

begin(default,method) : p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D -> Void

Method called before the display list rendering. This is the common place for this attribute to precompute things.

draw(default,method) : p_oGraphics : flash.display.Graphics -> p_oPolygon : sandy.core.data.Polygon -> p_oMaterial : sandy.materials.Material -> p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D -> Void

Draws all attributes to the graphics object.

drawOnSprite(default,method) : p_oSprite : sandy.core.scenegraph.Sprite2D -> p_oMaterial : sandy.materials.Material -> p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D -> Void

Applies attributes to a sprite.

finish(default,method) : p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D -> Void

Method called right after the display list rendering. This is the place to remove and dispose memory if necessary.

flags(__getFlags,null) : Int

Returns flags for attributes.

init(default,method) : p_oPolygon : sandy.core.data.Polygon -> Void

Allows all attributes to proceed to an initialization to know when the polyon isn't lined to the material.

unlink(default,method) : p_oPolygon : sandy.core.data.Polygon -> Void

Remove all initializations (opposite of init method) from all attributes.
